means: 轻度经济衰退，股票市场震动

sentence.Network_en: Only three companies are left after the shakeout in the computer market.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机市场重新调整之后,只剩下了三家公司.

sentence.Network_en: Individual traders are playing a key role in the current carry - trade shakeout.
sentence.Network_cn: 在当前的融资套利交易平仓热潮中,散户投资者扮演着重要的角色.

sentence.Network_en: The core shakeout problem for clamp - casting was solved using dovetail slot structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用燕尾槽活块结构解决了卡头内腔出芯问题.

entry.tran: (引起大量企业倒闭或大批工人失业的体制或组织的)重大变革，重组
entry.def: A shake-out is a major set of changes in a system or an organization which results in a large number of companies closing or a large number of people losing their jobs.

example.ex: This should be the year of a big shake-out in Italian banking...
example.tran: 本年度意大利银行业将进行大规模重组。

example.ex: The party needs a shake-out, if it is to be the driving-force of the new politics.
example.tran: 如果想要成为新政治的主力，该政党就需要进行重大变革。

means.word_mean: 1. a financial condition that results in the elimination of marginally financed participants in an industry;

sentences.sentence: "they glutted the market in order to cause a shakeout of their competitors"
